ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_idghm | |- ( R e. Grp -> ( _I |` ( Base ` R ) ) e. ( R GrpHom R ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cnvresid | |- `' ( _I |` ( Base ` R ) ) = ( _I |` ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 4 | 3, 2 | #P_syl5eqel | |- ( R e. Grp -> `' ( _I |` ( Base ` R ) ) e. ( R GrpHom R ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_isgim2 | |- ( ( _I |` ( Base ` R ) ) e. ( R GrpIso R ) <-> ( ( _I |` ( Base ` R ) ) e. ( R GrpHom R ) /\ `' ( _I |` ( Base ` R ) ) e. ( R GrpHom R ) ) ) |
